name: Dungeons of Darkness
description:
In a time of darkness, everything was destroyed

Only a few were spared.

It was foretold one of us would descend into the dungeons,

and find the key that would end this darkness.

Dungeons of Darkness is a fast-pace rogue-like dungeon crawler that will always keep you on your toes. You will descend to the darkest deepest dungeon to try to find the end to a time of darkness. Fight through waves of monsters set on guarding their deepest secret. Fight new foes you will have never encountered before. And upgrade your character to be the best possible version of yourself. It won't be easy.

I am a twelve year old game developer that started this game based on some tutorials I found online. Most of the graphics in this game are based of free assets I also found online. This game is the best out of all I have made before and I really hope you like it.

Descend

Descend into the darkest dungeon completely procedurally generated so it is a new experience every time you descend.

Fight

Use you trusty sword and shield to get past the waves of monsters and kill every last enemy that stands in your way.

Encounter new foes

Fight new foes you will have never fought before,

  • Dinosaurs   
  • Slimes   
  • Magicians   
  • Mages  
  • Minis  
  • Monstrous Rocks   

... and more

Upgrade

Use your gems you get from the monsters you kill

To buy upgrades from your favorite NCPs

    

Controls

Move with WASD
Attack with left mouse button
Shield with right mouse button
Space to roll
Use map with tab

Thank you to the people who provided free assets which I used in this game.

This was inspired by games like Wizard of Legend, Enter the Gungeon, and Moonlighter. I hope you like it.
